span.style: background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgb(250, 250, 250) 50%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 50%); color: rgb(255, 0, 34); text-shadow: rgb(252, 252, 252) 1px 1px 1px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.5; font-family: Arvo, sans-serif; min-width: 5px;

background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgb(250, 250, 250) 50%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 50%); color: rgb(255, 0, 34); text-shadow: rgb(252, 252, 252) 1px 1px 1px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.5; font-family: Arvo, sans-serif; min-width: 5px;

color: rgb(114, 114, 114); display: block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 8px; line-height: normal; font-family: "Open Sans Condensed", sans-serif;
